Package game.reset

Interface Resettable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bowser, Coin, Enemy, FlyingKoopa, Goomba, Koopa, Mature, PiranhaPlant, Player, Sapling, Sprout, Tree, WarpPipe, Yoshi
    public interface Resettable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default void registerInstance()
      A default interface method that register current instance to the Singleton manager.
      void resetInstance()
      Allows any classes that use this interface to reset abilities, attributes, and/or items.

    • Method Detail

      • resetInstance

        void resetInstance()
        Allows any classes that use this interface to reset abilities, attributes, and/or items.

      • registerInstance

        default void registerInstance()
        A default interface method that register current instance to the Singleton manager. It allows corresponding class uses to be affected by global reset
